title: Ep 8 | Miracles, Beach Vacations, and the Origin of Sin
description:
Willie and Jase don’t share the same definition of a miracle. Phil sits out the family beach trip every year: “It wouldn’t be hell, but close to it.” The guys also discuss the origins of sin.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
